documents.title: Services & Pricing - Injectables
documents.content: Botox: $12/unit (most foreheads 20-40 units). Lip filler: $650/syringe for subtle enhancement. Cheek filler: 2-3 syringes recommended for lift. Results aim for natural, not over-filled.

documents.title: Booking & Deposit Policies
documents.content: New clients place a $50 refundable deposit that is applied to treatment. Reschedule with 24 hours notice to keep the deposit. Same-day cancellations or no-shows forfeit the deposit.

documents.title: Hours & Location
documents.content: Location: 123 Beauty Blvd, Suite 200, Scottsdale, AZ. Hours: Mon 9-6, Tue 10-7, Wed 9-6, Thu 10-7, Fri 9-5, Sat 9-4. Free covered parking in the attached garage.
